Summary: bright fireball falling as if a shooting star but much more colorful, larger, and burned longer. thought it could be a sattelite but still seemed larger. burned out before getting close to ground. saw a few odd purple electricsl flashes before sighting.
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home, saw a few purple flashes thought was from powerlines but not normal in any way. Driving east with father and we both stopped and started asking if eachother saw it. neither has seen anything like it. comet seemed closest but it was a colorful fireball not just light.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Tooele
There were no other sightings in Tooele on or around March 20th 2013
